name: 流氓读大学 liumang dudaxue
description: This is a performance art work for game lovers who have been learning game development for ten years. I am a rogue, I want to go to college.  Learning, hard work, progress, simulation, independence, these words summarize the game. This is a casual and casual learning simulation game where you play a culture of no culture. What's interesting is that the goal of the game is to let you go to college, learn and study, and get enough credits, but also fight with physics, chemistry, Chinese, mathematics and other subjects. You also need to learn to allocate time to the exam reasonably. Come on, you are the "rogue professor."
